poem:
Title: "Ode to the 2024 Presidential Sprint"

Among the humble ballot's song, 
past riots spark - yet we belong,
to dreams of peace within this chess,
of queens and pawns and grand progress.
The stage is set, our faith reborn, 
in the eye of the electoral storm.
In hand, the heart of democracy,
we trace the lines of our legacy.
